data.message: Hi....thanks for the new filters on Facebook.....!!! I'm loving this new feature! !!!!!!!! My favorite is the 3 layout camera and the colorful screen! !!!! Thnx Facebook  @Facebook .....keep all the filters....more people loving it

replies.message: You're very welcome, Gurjit! We're glad you're enjoying Camera. :) -Jessica
How much did FB pay you to say this?

Hahaha....Why would you even have a thought that Facebook paid me?..!! I love this new feature, so I decided to go ahead and thanked facebook, so if you liked a person and u said you are looking beautiful and person replies Thank you, would that mean the somebody paid you for giving a compliment(beautiful) ...?..!!  Laura McCaffrey-Minor.       Facebook
It is not possible to like this. Not even a little bit.
